response.job_title: Tenured Professor at Universidad Nacional de Colombia

profile_positions.description:
28 years of experience as Architectural Design Studio Critic at Universidad Nacional de Colombia. 5 years of experience as Design Studio Critic at Universidad de los Andes.36 Years of experience as principal of Ivan Correa Arquitecto & Co.With over 200 projects, several of them as winner of public design competitions. Including Housing Condominiums, , Educational Facilities for Colegio Nueva Granada in Bogota, Hotel and Recreation Facilities, Convention Halls, Research Facilities, Extensive Consulting experience in Architectural and Urban Design Projects for Public Parks, Public Schools, Public Transportation for the MIO project in Cali Colombia, Cementery Parks.Private Villas, Recycling of Buildings, Office Space. Branch Offices for Colpatria Bank. Etc. 
Articles on History and Theory of Architecture. Writting the book "Notas de Clase" on architectural Education.
profile_positions.title: Tenured Professor

education.field_of_study: Reserach Scholar in the field of Neuro-Aesthetics
